Package ray.rage.rendersystem.shader.glsl

  • Class Summary 
    Class Description
    AbstractGlslProgram
    Base implementation of the shader-program interface.
    AbstractGlslProgramAttribute<T>
    Base implementation of the attribute interface.
    AbstractGlslProgramAttributeBuffer
    Base implementation for an attribute buffer of floating-point values.
    AbstractGlslProgramInput<T>
    Base implementation of the GpuShaderProgram.Input interface.
    AbstractGlslProgramLocatableInput<T>
    Base implementation of the GpuShaderProgram.LocatableInput interface.
    AbstractGlslProgramStorageBuffer<T>
    Base implementation of the GpuShaderProgram.StorageBuffer interface.
    AbstractGlslProgramUniform<T>
    Base implementation for the GpuShaderProgram.Uniform interface.
    GlslContextUtil
    A simple class with a utility method to retrieve a current rendering GLContext from a GLCanvas.
    GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec2
    An attribute buffer of 2-component floating-point vectors, as expected by a GLSL shader program.
    GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec3
    An attribute buffer of 3-component floating-point vectors, as expected by a GLSL shader program.
    GlslProgramAttributeBufferVec4
    An attribute buffer of 4-component floating-point vectors, as expected by a GLSL shader program.
    GlslProgramContext
    Concrete implementation of the context interface.
    GlslProgramFactory
    Concrete implementation of the shader-program-factory interface.
    GlslProgramIndexBuffer
    A buffer of integer values, as expected by a GLSL shader program.
    GlslProgramStorageBufferFloat
    A buffer of floating-point values, as expected by a GLSL shader program.
    GlslProgramUniformBool
    An input uniform for boolean types.
    GlslProgramUniformFloat
    An input uniform for floating-poing scalars.
    GlslProgramUniformInt
    An input uniform for integer scalars.
    GlslProgramUniformMat3
    An input uniform for a 3x3 column-major matrix.
    GlslProgramUniformMat4
    An input uniform for a 4x4 column-major matrix.
    GlslProgramUniformVec3
    An input uniform for a 3-component vector.
    GlslProgramUniformVec4
    An input uniform for a 4-component vector.
    GlslRenderingProgram
    Concrete implementation of a shader-program to process renderables.
    GlslSkeletalRenderingProgram
    Concrete implementation of a shader-program to process renderables.
    GlslSkyBoxProgram
    Concrete implementation of a shader-program to process a sky-box.
    GlslTessProgram
    Concrete implementation of a shader-program to process a tessellation.
